# Commands

* Erase flash memory
`esptool.py --port /dev/ttyUSB0 erase_flash`

* Flash 
`esptool.py --port /dev/ttyUSB0 --baud 460800 write_flash --flash_size=detect -fm dio 0 esp8266-20190928-v1.11-361-g4ba0aff47.bin `

* rshell
`rshell -p /dev/ttyUSB0`

* setup webrepl
`import webrepl_setup`
